item.description:
Hello Java Programmers,
let's talk, Java, JME, SDK, agile, enterprise, what ever is on your mind.

Our meetings are personal, engaging and everybody is sharing in the topic at hand. Come and share your experience with your peers. Our new venue is "Middlesex Lounge" Cambridge.

Kaj
P.S.: Thank you to the many members that RSVP (one way or another). This helps me to manage the crowd at the venue.
item.name: The Boston Java May Meetup
